languages.text: {n}Над ними слабо, подобно дыханию покойника, переливается надпись:{/n} "Владыка, сей завет изрек я сути своей в назидание, дабы после дремы сбывшейся в вечности я исторгнул забвение о том, что потерял, обретя все, и что обрел, все потеряв. Вбираю усопшие образы не зная спешащих мгновений, ибо вечность есть мне преклонение. Возлагаю длань и внемлю, покуда память моя гробницей нетлеющей не упокоит останки былого".

traits.locale_text: "Владыка, сей завет изрек ты сам сути своей в назидание, дабы после дремы сбывшейся в вечности ты исторгнул забвение о том, что ты потерял, обретя все, и что обрел, все потеряв. Вбирай усопшие образы не зная спешащих мгновений, ибо вечность есть тебе преклонение. Возложи длань и внемли, покуда память твоя гробницей нетлеющей не упокоит останки былого".

languages.text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."
languages.original_text: {n}Над ними слабо, подобно дыханию покойника, переливается надпись:{/n} "Владыка, сей завет изрек я сути своей в назидание, дабы после дремы сбывшейся в вечности я исторгнул забвение о том, что потерял, обретя все, и что обрел, все потеряв. Вбираю усопшие образы не зная спешащих мгновений, ибо вечность есть мне преклонение. Возлагаю длань и внемлю, покуда память моя гробницей нетлеющей не упокоит останки былого".

traits.locale_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament for the edification of my own essence, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass in eternity, I may shed my obliviousness of that which I lost when I gained all, and that which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the defunct images, unheedful of the festinate moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an immarcescible tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

{n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament for the edification of my own essence, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass in eternity, I may shed my obliviousness of that which I lost when I gained all, and that which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the defunct images, unheedful of the festinate moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an immarcescible tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

{n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

languages.text: {n}Por encima hay otra inscripción, débil como el aliento de un moribundo.{/n} «Mi Señor, proclamo este testamento para edificar mi espíritu para que cuando la visión de mi recuerdo suceda eternamente pueda despojar mi olvido de lo que perdí cuando lo gané todo y de lo que gané cuando lo perdí todo. Absorbo las imágenes inertes, haciendo caso omiso de los momentos efímeros puesto que mi eternidad es mi adoración. Coloco mi mano y escucho hasta que mi memoria sea una tumba imperecedera en la que descansan las cenizas de eras pasadas».
languages.original_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por encima hay otra inscripción, débil como el aliento de un moribundo.{/n} «Mi Señor, proclamo este testamento para edificar mi espíritu para que cuando la visión de mi recuerdo suceda eternamente pueda despojar mi olvido de lo que perdí cuando lo gané todo y de lo que gané cuando lo perdí todo. Absorbo las imágenes inertes, haciendo caso omiso de los momentos efímeros puesto que mi eternidad es mi adoración. Coloco mi mano y escucho hasta que mi memoria sea una tumba imperecedera en la que descansan las cenizas de eras pasadas».

languages.text: {n}Ils sont surmontés d'une autre inscription dont le scintillement est aussi faible que le souffle d'un mort.{/n} « Mon seigneur, j'ai prononcé ce témoignage pour édifier mon esprit. Ainsi, lorsque mon rêve éveillé prendra fin, je pourrai me remémorer ce que j'ai perdu lorsque j'ai tout gagné, mais aussi ce que j'ai gagné lorsque j'ai tout perdu. J'absorbe ces images sans vie, sans faire cas des instants fugaces, car c'est l'éternité que je vénère. Je pose la main et je prête l'oreille, jusqu'à faire de ma mémoire un tombeau impérissable dans lequel reposeront les cendres du temps passé. »
languages.original_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ils sont surmontés d'une autre inscription dont le scintillement est aussi faible que le souffle d'un mort.{/n} « Mon seigneur, j'ai prononcé ce témoignage pour édifier mon esprit. Ainsi, lorsque mon rêve éveillé prendra fin, je pourrai me remémorer ce que j'ai perdu lorsque j'ai tout gagné, mais aussi ce que j'ai gagné lorsque j'ai tout perdu. J'absorbe ces images sans vie, sans faire cas des instants fugaces, car c'est l'éternité que je vénère. Je pose la main et je prête l'oreille, jusqu'à faire de ma mémoire un tombeau immarcescible dans lequel reposeront les cendres du temps passé. »

languages.text: {n}その上には、死人の息のごとく弱々しい碑文が光っている。{/n}「我が主よ、私の空想のヴィジョンが永遠のものとなった後、すべてを手にした時に失った物、すべてを失った時に手にした物を忘れることができるよう、ここに魂の啓発の証を語ります。私は生気のないイメージを吸収し、一瞬の出来事には目もくれません。なぜなら、永遠こそ我が崇拝の対象なのですから。我が記憶が過ぎ去った時間の亡骸が眠る不滅の墓標となるまで、私は手を置いて傾聴いたします」
languages.original_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}その上には、死人の息のごとく弱々しい碑文が光っている。{/n}「我が主よ、私の空想のヴィジョンが永遠のものとなった後、すべてを手にした時に失った物、すべてを失った時に手にした物を忘れることができるよう、ここに魂の啓発の証を語ります。私は生気のないイメージを吸収し、一瞬の出来事には目もくれません。なぜなら、永遠こそ我が崇拝の対象なのですから。我が記憶が過ぎ去った時間の亡骸が眠る墓標となるまで、私は手を置いて傾聴いたします」

languages.text: {n}在这些符号之上，另一个铭文散发着微光，就像将死之人的呼吸一样微弱。{/n}“我的主，我记下这些记录，是为了教诲我的精神。这样，当我在幻象中的永恒结束之后，或许我会想起当我得到一切时失去了什么，以及当我失去一切时得到了什么。我吸收了毫无生气的具象，丝毫不在意飞逝的无数瞬间，因为永恒才是我的信仰。我将手放在那里，倾听着，直到我的记忆化为一座坚不可摧的坟墓，埋葬着过去岁月的灰烬。”
languages.original_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

traits.locale_text: {n}在这些符号之上，另一个铭文散发着微光，就像将死之人的呼吸一样微弱。{/n}“我的主，我记下这些记录，是为了教诲我的精神。这样，当我在幻象中的永恒结束之后，或许我会想起当我得到一切时失去了什么，以及当我失去一切时得到了什么。我吸收了毫无生气的具象，丝毫不在意飞逝的无数瞬间，因为永恒才是我的信仰。我将手放在那里，倾听着，直到我的记忆化为一座坚不可摧的坟墓，埋葬着过去岁月的灰烬。”

languages.text: {n}Über ihnen steht eine weitere Inschrift, deren Flackern so schwach ist wie der Atem eines Sterbenden.{/n} "Herr, ich habe dieses Testament gesprochen, um meinen Geist zu erbauen, auf dass die Vision meiner Träume ewiglich verwirklicht werde, auf dass ich mein Vergessen dessen ablegen kann, was ich verloren habe, als ich alles gewonnen habe, und dessen, was ich gewonnen habe, als ich alles verloren habe. Ich absorbiere die leblosen Bilder, die flüchtigen Augenblicke nicht beachtend, denn die Ewigkeit ist meine Verehrung. Ich lege meine Hand und lausche, bis meine Erinnerung ein unzerstörbares Grab ist, in welchem die Asche früherer Zeiten zur Ruhe gebettet wird."
languages.original_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."

Ich lege meine Hand und lausche, bis meine Erinnerung ein unzerstörbares Grab ist, in welchem die Asche früherer Zeiten zur Ruhe gebettet wird."

languages.text: {n}Üzerilerinde parıltısı ölü bir adamın nefesi kadar güçsüz olan bir yazı daha var.{/n} "Lordum, bu ahdi ruhumu eğitmek için dile getirdim. Böylece düşlemimin vizyonu ebedî olarak gelip geçtikten sonra, her şeyi elde ettiğimde kaybettiğim ve her şeyi kaybettiğimde elde ettiğim şeyin yok oluşundan kurtulabilirim. Yaşamsız görüntüleri, geçici anları bir kenara koyarak özüme çekiyorum, nihayetinde benim tapınmam ebedî. Elimi koyup dinliyorum. Hafızam; geçmiş zamanların küllerinin ebediyete kadar istirahat edeceği, yok edilemez bir kabir hâlini alana kadar dinleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}Above them is another inscription, its flickering as feeble as a dead man's breath.{/n} "My Lord, I have spoken this testament to edify my spirit, so that after my reverie's vision comes to pass eternally, I may shed my oblivion of that, which I lost when I gained all, and that, which I gained when I lost all. I absorb the lifeless images, unheedful of the fleeting moments, for eternity is my worship. I lay my hand and hearken, until my memory is an imperishable tomb wherein the ashes of times past are laid to rest."
